name: Maths Paths
description:
Add, subtract, multiply and divide along your way through grids of numbers to form paths that lead to the solutions of mathematical puzzles. 
Use simple tap and swiping controls to form one way paths and reach the solution while covering all the numbers in the grid. 
Start anywhere you want, end anywhere you want. 
Some puzzles may even have multiple solutions. It's all up to you to find them using your mathematical genius. 
The math is easy enough that you won't need a calculator but the puzzles are tricky enough for you to be good with numbers to solve them. 
Although each puzzle can be eventually solved by trial and error but solving them yourself using your brain is the most satisfying experience.

So bring out your inner mathematician and challenge yourself with these ever-increasing number of puzzles. More and more puzzles shall be added with every update.
